name: GANGNATH YOUTH FOUNDATION

address: Rzc-23,Gali No 10, Gurudwara Road, Mahavir Enclave Part 1

briefDescription: Gangnath Youth Foundation believes that education plays a vital role for the development of a child. GYF is set up in 2012 and is registered under the societies registration Act 1860. GYF is working towards the upliftment of the children women and underprivileged sections of the society. Providing free education and scholarships to the children who are economically backward. Promoting and following the govt. “Sarv siksha mission”. Under this mission, GYF provides free education, notebooks, stationary and study materials to the slum children. We also provide the youth a platform to bring social changes and work towards their social responsibilities .
